author: acmurthy
msg: HADOOP-2098.  Log start & completion of empty jobs to JobHistory, which also ensures that we close the file-descriptor of the job's history log opened during job-submission. Contributed by Amar Kamat.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Fixed Axis2 binding so that it doesn't just hardcode port 8085 as it's not consistent with all the other bindings and prevents distributed nodes to work on different ports unless the application developer goes and specifies the port numbers explicitly in all composites. Allow an SCA node to configure the servlet host with a default port number for the node. Fixed DomainImpl and NodeImpl to configure the NodeFactory on time for SCA binding providers to pick it up. Fixed test composites which assumed port 8085 to always be used. Fixed distributed node test cases to specify proper node URIs.

author: acmurthy
msg: HADOOP-2096.  Close open file-descriptors held by streams while localizing job.xml in the JobTracker and while displaying it on the webui in jobconf.jsp. Contributed by Amar Kamat.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Making progress with the tutorial. Now able to run the store and an external catalog on different SCA nodes.

author: gawor
msg: removing old (and unused) geronimo-plugin.xml files as they are automatically generated now
